channel.title: W18 dic3 clan
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/20576ad.png[/img]
Hello and welcome to the official page of "W18 Dic3".
W18 dic3 is a new friends chat which was released today based on "Legit" Dicing. Nowadays there are many clans which claim to be legit dicers for the sake of earning money for them selves. With "W18 dic3" we are an open host clan chat which accepts all hosters under one condition.
The one condition/ requirement to being a hoster in "W18 Dic3" is to be legit. By the term "Legit" I mean you must pay out to players when you have lost and they have won.
If you are scammed by a "Rank" and have evidence which can be posted in our "Photo Gallery" We will gladly refund your money to make sure that you are satisfied with our services. Remember to trust ranks over other players as you are more assured of payment as "Ranks" have payed a high sum of money for there position and if found not to be legit they will be "Banned" from the clan meaning their money has gone to waste.
In "W18 dic3" we also complete a number of drop parties a week ranging from 20m up to 500m depending on the amount of players who are in clan chat, so if you invite your friends there is a higher chance of a big drop party.
So remember Trust Ranks and i hope you have fun dicing in our New friends chat! Remember be nice as this is also a social friends chat!
In "W18 dic3" there are two main numbers of dicing, these numbers vary from rank to non-rank.
Non- ranks
Non ranks are only allowed to do a maximum of 55x2 dicing the reason for this is to keep dicing fair amongst normal players. Non-ranks are also allowed to do "DD" with any type of dice they please ( No mins or Max's)
Ranks
Ranks are allowed to do a maximum of 65x2 dicing. The only Ranks who are allowed to host 65x2 dice games are "Generals". The reason why Generals are allowed to do 65x2 is because General is a rank which can not be bought but earned therefore meaning they are 100 percent Legit and can be trusted.
All other ranks are allowed to host a maximum of 60x2 as they have paid for their ranks therefore allowing them to have more benefits within the clan.
Costs of Rank
Recruit: 5m
Corporal: 10m
Sergeant: 15m
Lieutenant: 20m
Captain: 40m
General: Is earned by legit dicing. ( Player must have rank to earn general)
Our Official website [url=http://w18dic3.webs.com/]http://w18dic3.webs.com/[/url] Our Official youtube channel [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/w18dic3]http://www.youtube.com/user/w18dic3[/url]

@pot_up_pls wrote:

Your forums suck ass.

item.title: W18 dic3 clan
item.dc:creator: @Adolfototh Adolfototh
item.description:
@Adolfototh wrote:

[quote=“rossy319, post:3, topic:416015”]This cc has over 60 subscribers, it is new but already growing. several people have already paid 5m for recruit and 1 person has payed 40m for captain. All of these ranks have already made the money which they have spent on rank.

Each rank has their videos of pay outs which will be uploaded to the youtube channel by me.

Also ranks are expensive so that not anyone of the streets buy it as i do not want people who are not legit as ranks to ruin the reputation of the clan.[/quote]

I got the criteria but what about people who are new players and don’t have any good ranking? So without ranking can take the benefit of this chat application?

Read full topic

item.title: W18 dic3 clan
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I loled at “This cc has over 60 subscribers” my clan has over 25,000M trading hands everyday from 10 dice hosts I selected, I didn’t have them pay, I know them personally and I know they wont scam. Selling spots is like selling the right to scam. GTFO.

Read full topic

item.title: W18 dic3 clan
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

This cc has over 60 subscribers, it is new but already growing. several people have already paid 5m for recruit and 1 person has payed 40m for captain. All of these ranks have already made the money which they have spent on rank.

Each rank has their videos of pay outs which will be uploaded to the youtube channel by me.

Also ranks are expensive so that not anyone of the streets buy it as i do not want people who are not legit as ranks to ruin the reputation of the clan.

Read full topic

item.title: W18 dic3 clan
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

So, basically, your selling ranks, when they should actually be earned. How stupid. Also, no one is going to pay even 5m for a recruit rank when this CC is brand new.

Read full topic
